ColumnTextComponent.Name: PharmacyText
ColumnTextComponent.TextColumn: Shawn Andreasen, Pharm.D., R.Ph., our pharmacist, became a member of the BYU-Idaho Health Center team in December 2004. He graduated from pharmacy school at Idaho State University in May 2003. Shawn received his bachelor's degree in Microbiology at BYU in Provo.
